Reviews.Title: “Mejorable”
Reviews.Author: Servicios2012
Reviews.Content: Nos quedamos tres dias en este hotel; bien ubicado en la avenida principal de la ciudad, a 15 minutos de disney en carro. Tenia mininevera, micronda, piscina, lavanderia. Le falto limpieza, el wifi no funcionaba en nuestra habitacion y en el exterior la señal no era buena. La habitacion no la hicieron los 2 primeros dias ni cambiaron toallas hasta que fui a la recepcion. En todo caso la atencion y trato de todos fue muy amable. We stayed three days in this hotel; well located on the main avenue of the city, 15 minutes from disney in car. Had mininevera, microoven, pool, laundry. Need a little cleaning, the wifi did not work in our room and the outside signal was not good. The room not made it the first 2 days or changed towels until I went to the reception. In any case the care and treatment of all was very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: prcrazy
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Sevilla Inn on and off for 22 Years. We stayed there when they opened and it was brand new. We had not stayed in the Sevilla inn in 8 years. Since then, The German couple that owned it and operated it sold it and no longer are there. We stayed for two nights. The Good - The price was excellent. We paid 39.00 per night. The beds were confortable, The linens were clean, The room was clean and most importantly there were no bugs or roaches at all. The A/C worked very well. The Bad and the Ugly - The sink and tub did not drain properly so there was standing water in the tub when we showered. On the exterior of the hotel, it seems a bit run down, The lawn and gardens were unkept, in the hall ways there some lights that were out and the ice machine was broken. When the German couple owned it, the place was impeccable in its appearance. We were given a room that looked remodelled and updated. I do not know if all the rooms have been remodelled and updated. It was on the second floor on top of the office very close to the main road. At night there was alot of traffic noise. There is a strip malll next to the hotel. In the strip mall there was a Dominican night club. On Saturday night there was loud music till the wee hours of the night. We travel with ear plugs so the noise really did not bother us. If you are travelling with kids or do not travel with ear plugs you may want to request a room on the opposite side of the hotel facing away from the strip mall. You may also want to request a room in the back of the hotel due to the traffic noise we experienced so close to the main road. In conclusion, If you are looking for a Cheap and Clean place to sleep that has no bugs this is a good option. Be realistic in your expectation, Do not expect the Hilton or the Ritz for 39.00 a night. Hope this helps

Reviews.Title: “I love the Sevilla Inn and go there every year”
Reviews.Author: Boyd-M
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this inn for severeal years this October being the latest, I had a beautiful room very well furnished a king size bed with lovely bed linen and very lovely furniture ( I was told it was a newly refurbished room and that all rooms would be refurbished in time.) The staff were very helpful in fact I would say they couldn't have been nicer , how could anyone say they weren't is beyond my belief the only complaint was that the pool is cold and its not very attractive although there are plenty of sun beds ( one or two had broken straps ) tables and chairs and a BBQ. I really enjoy it there and will for sure use them again the next time I am in Orlando which is my annual vacation centre. Thanks to the manager , he was so helpful I never saw the owners but have done so in previous stays there they are always very helpful too as I was on the first floor the staff carried my luggage up and down the starirs, Thanks to them also. Surfice to say I wouldn't stay at any other hotel in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Time”
Reviews.Author: smilealllyear
Reviews.Content: I Just want to say that this is one of the best places my family and i have ever stayed in. The staff there are great. The room was very clean and nice. The staff are pleasant, nice and very very friendly. I enjoyed the quietness of the place and enjoyed the overall location. I did not expect a place as affortable as this one to be so much more pleasant and clean then other places I have paid more for. I recommend this family operated motel to all families especially those with little ones. My kids really enjoyed it and so did I. Thanks Sevilla Inn I will be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Basic rooms”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for 5 nights visiting the Orlando attractions. For that purpose the hotel is OK, i.e. if you use it only as a sleeping place. The pool looks good in the web page, but in reality it's not very attractive. The rooms are clean (not very clean, i.e. during our stay the carpet has not been vacuum-clened). The hotel location is bit off the central highway 192 motel and restaurant strip. However, for the price ($40) it's a good choice and one can/should not expect more.

Reviews.Title: “hurricane charlie”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: THE OWNERS WERE SUPER...having no place to go when charlie hit they made us feel safe. the room was super cleanest fresh towels friendly i think personally it is one of the clean places on 192

Reviews.Title: “home away from home!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Kissimmee Florida on December 23rd, 2004. We had booked a weeks stay at the Condo Lodge. What a mistake that was. As we left the Condo Lodge, looking for a suitable place to stay, we went up and down 192, looking for a place that had a vacancy. Sevilla Inn did. We went into the office and were greeted by wonderful people, that couldn't help us enough. They had 2 ajoining rooms, which we checked out first, and took immediately. Through our entire 7 day stay at this family owned Inn, we were always greeted with respect, chatted with us about the things to do in the area, and just plain were lovely people to deal with. The business is owned by a husband and wife, and the daughter works there too. The husband is very well informed on golf, all the coarses, and talked non stop with my husband regarding golf, as they both loved the game. He went out of his way to call the coarses for my husband and get tee times for him. The wife and their daughter couldn't do enough for us. What wonderful people and a wonderful, wonderful place to stay. I give this Inn a gold star!! Travel to Kissimmee Florida, and stay at this clean and neat Inn. You'll be glad you did!

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and simple, not a gamble”
Reviews.Author: Businessguy_10
Reviews.Content: Positives: Microwave, frig, family owned and monitored, German in every way (appearance, everything works, everything very clean), stop-n-rob next door, quiet, attractive exterior Negatives: 25 cents for ice, pool a little cool, a little higher price than surrounding hotels but some of them look like real dives, no premium cable, farther down Irlo Bronson Hwy (farther from Disney) Had to laugh, reading the previous reviews. We were in room 122 and there was a iron burn in the carpet!! Have to recommend and will likely stay again. They said if you call them, they will do better than Sidestep.com price (they don't get paid for 4 months through those services)

Reviews.Title: “Nice Room - Not So Nice Staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sevilla Inn in 1997 as part of our honeymoon. It was our first trip to Florida. The initial part of our stay was quite comfortable. The room was tidy and the rooms were acceptable. We were quite surprised at the size of the pool (it was quite small) and did not appear heated. One night that we were staying there, the alarm went off and we never did understand what had happened. Other than that, the hotel itself was fine. One incident saw them coming to our room to deal with the toilet being plugged and them accusing us of having put disposal women's pads down there, even though my wife had no such need nor did we do such a thing. Unfortunately, the clearest memory of the stay was upon checking out when we were advised that we would be charged for "ironing burns to the carpet". We were actually scolded at not using iron boards which were available to the rooms, yet there were no postings seen of such availabilities (we had ironed our clothes over blankets laid out on the floor). Although we had not seen any damages to the carpet, the staff became insistent that they were there and, quite frankly, made us very uncomfortable at the tones of their voices. They charged us $20.00 for the supposed burns, which we did not argue and paid, and we were off. We have been back to Kissimmee a few times since, but have never since considered staying at the Sevilla Inn. I am still not sure if the burns were actually there, but giving them the benfit of the doubt, our biggest complaint was with the manner in which they treated us. They weren't very friendly whenever we had to interact with them.

Reviews.Title: “we liked it”
Reviews.Author: jadziadax
Reviews.Content: We really liked staying here. We had just finished at WDW's Caribbean Resort $129 a night and went on to stay at Sevilla Inn. Yes Sevilla Inn is a timeshare resort and they only very softly tried to encourage you on that subject. But you got lots of freebies, free dinner and karaoke one night. It was a really friendly place and had a nice pool. Very good for only $33 a night. I think I got the idea to stay there from the Fodors guide also. The room was basic but not a lot different from the expensive WDW resort we had just stayed in. Not as flash but way better price. You are not trapped at Sevilla Inn for the food side of things. Which is how we felt at the WDW resort. (trapped into paying exorbitant prices for their food). Sevilla Inn is close to lots of restaurants and food joints.

Reviews.Title: “sevilla inn---just plain good”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Before buying our timeshare in Florida my wife and I have stayed many times here at the Sevilla Inn. Found it through the Fodor travel guide and we were never disappointed with the Inn or the staff there. It is a family owned operation and they take pride in their hotel. Let's face it when your in Orlando/Kissimmee most of the day your out and about and you only need a room to sleep in and the Sevilla Inn is a great choice. Always clean and very accomodating. Once when I traveled alone late into the night to get there they left the light in my room on so it would be easier for me to find. M & S

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Outstanding at Sevilla Inn”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Sevilla Inn many times. We have always found the hotel to be immaculately clean and the staff more than courteous. I think the hotel is excellent for the price and is quiet and well appointed.

HotelInfo.Name: Sevilla Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 4640 W. Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway, Kissimmee, FL 34746
